title: Maori
creator_credit: New Zealand. Ministry of Foreign Affairs
brief_description: Discusses the Maori population in New Zealand and describes their customs, traditions and spiritual beliefs. Also makes reference to employment opportunities as well as social problems, experienced by Maoris. Contrasts modern New Zealand society with traditional Maori culture.
description: Discusses the Maori population in New Zealand and describes their customs, traditions and spiritual beliefs. Also makes reference to employment opportunities as well as social problems, experienced by Maoris. Contrasts modern New Zealand society with traditional Maori culture.
